name: Saiba Jama
description:
SAI BA JAMMA Overview  

SAI BA JAMMA is an isometric 2D game set in a TRON/Cyberpunk universe where our player must hack (possess) enemies to solve puzzles and move on. 

 

GOALS

The objective of our game is to hack between enemies to keep yourself alive until you have completed hacking all terminals. 

HOOK

Hacking and possessing enemies to survive 

3 Cs Character 

We play as Z, a hacker specializing in hacking mainframes. 

Camera

Isometric view like Hades and transistor 

Controls

WASD to move, Mouse-click to hack enemies 

TEAM MEMBERS

Miko - Programmer, Game Designer , PM  

Abhay - 2D Artist

Sinan Bakkaloglu -  UI Programmer, Sound

Joshua - Level Designer, VFX, Sound
